title: Why choose us?
subtitle: TINCADIA not only connects talent: it educates, raises awareness, and measures social impact to transform inclusion into real actions.

items: Compliance with inclusion policies and Sustainable Development Goals (SDG 8, 10, and 17).
Improvement in corporate reputation and work climate.
Accompaniment in communicative accessibility and inclusive processes.
Access to technological tools that facilitate communication with deaf collaborators.
Greater access to job and educational opportunities.
Training in Colombian Sign Language, technology, and artificial intelligence.
Promotion of inclusive and accessible spaces.
Promotion of respect, diversity, and elimination of communication barriers.

businessImpact.title: Business impact
items: Real transformation of internal processes towards inclusion.
Measurement and monitoring of social impact.
Implementation of accessible tools for diverse teams.
Direct contribution to the employability of deaf people in Colombia.
